body:
### Welcome to My github page

Hello there, I am a passionate developer working in Monte-Carlo for a company I founded there.
You may find some of my Open Source contributions on my github profile. Feel free to fork and send me feedback.

### Blog

You may also be interested in reading my weekly posts on blogger at this address:
http://orion98mc.blogspot.com
name: Thierry Passeron
